data.question: What is the chemical formula of the porous metal-organic framework discussed?
What is the Langmuir surface area of the framework?

data.answer: Hydrogen storage material and guest sensor

data.question: Is the framework insoluble in water and common organic solvents?

data.answer: They contribute to the framework's stability and guest-dependent luminescence.
